definition: A term used to describe something that is not part of a group or set, but rather exists or occurs on its own. It is commonly used to refer to individual items or elements that are separate or distinct from others.

examples.german: Ich habe nur noch ein einziges Stück Schokolade.
examples.english: I only have one piece of chocolate left.

examples.german: Er hat die Aufgabe alleine und einzeln erledigt.
examples.english: He completed the task alone and individually.

examples.german: Die einzelnen Teile des Puzzles passen perfekt zusammen.
examples.english: The individual pieces of the puzzle fit perfectly together.

examples.german: Die einzelnen Blumen im Garten sind wunderschön.
examples.english: The individual flowers in the garden are beautiful.
